data: The event Client Integration Call aimed to review and plan the API integration between Globex Corp and the Payment API service
The event Client Integration Call covered the API integration plan, timeline discussion, budget constraints, and resource allocation concerns
The event Client Integration Call resulted in the decision to extend the integration timeline to three weeks
The event Client Integration Call resulted in the decision to schedule a budget review next Tuesday
The event Client Integration Call resulted in the action item to draft a revised proposal by Friday
The event Client Integration Call resulted in the action item to prepare a budget overview
The event Client Integration Call identified key milestones in the API integration plan and set a follow-up call on Monday
